13  package biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.cache;
14  
15  import java.util.List;
16  
17  import biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.LessSource;
18  
19  /**
20   * Responsible for storing source files imports paths.
21   * @since 1.0
22   */
23  public interface SourceImportsCache {
24  
25      /**
26       * Saves a imports list defined in a {@link LessSource}.
27       * @param source the {@link LessSource}.
28       * @param imports the imports list.
29       * @since 1.0
30       */
31      void saveSourceImports(LessSource source, List<String> imports);
32  
33      /**
34       * Tests whether cache contains imports list for a {@link LessSource}.
35       * @param source the {@link LessSource}.
36       * @return {@code true} whether cache contains imports list, otherwise {@code false}.
37       * @since 1.0
38       */
39      boolean hasSourceImports(LessSource source);
40  
41      /**
42       * Returns imports list defined in a {@link LessSource}.
43       * @param source the {@link LessSource}.
44       * @return the imports list.
45       * @since 1.0
46       */
47      List<String> getSourceImports(LessSource source);
48  }
